name: Event Type
description: Communicates trigger event information including event type, timing, and responsible parties

EVN.1.name: Event Type Code
EVN.1.description: Code that corresponds to the trigger event that caused the message

EVN.2.name: Recorded Date/Time
EVN.2.description: Date and time the event was recorded in the system

EVN.3.name: Date/Time Planned Event
EVN.3.description: Date and time the event was originally planned to occur

EVN.5.name: Operator ID
EVN.5.description: Individual responsible for triggering the event

EVN.6.name: Event Occurred
EVN.6.description: Actual date and time when the triggering event occurred

notes: EVN.1 (Event Type Code) is required and should match MSH.9 trigger event
EVN.6 (Event Occurred) may differ from EVN.2 (when recorded in system)
